text: Embassy of Albania in Beijing Albania established diplomatic relations with China on November 23, 1949. As a United Nations member state, in 1963, Albania proposed and supported diplomatically the readmission of China to this organization. On October 25, 1971, at the 26th session of the General Assembly, the People's Republic of China was fully admitted to the UN.Ambasada Shqiptare në Kinë ==List of diplomatic representatives of Albania to China (1954–present)== {| cellpadding="0" cellspacing="3" style="border:1px solid #000000; font-size:88%; line-height: 1.5em;" |- |'''''' |'''''' |'''''' |colspan="2"|' |- |align=center|1 |Nesti Nase |Ambassador |align=center|1954 |align=center|1956 |- |align=center|2 |Delo Balili |Ambassador |align=center|1956 |align=center|1959 |- |align=center|3 |Mihal Prifti |Ambassador |align=center|1959 |align=center|1961 |- |align=center|4 |Reiz Malile |Ambassador |align=center|1961 |align=center|1963 |- |align=center|5 |Nesti Nase |Ambassador |align=center|1963 |align=center|1966 |- |align=center|6 |Vasil Nathanaili |Ambassador |align=center|1966 |align=center|1969 |- |align=center|7 |Xhorxhi Robo |Ambassador |align=center|1969 |align=center|1973 |- |align=center|8 |Behar Shtylla |Ambassador |align=center|1973 |align=center|1979 |- |align=center|9 |Jonuz Mersini |Ambassador |align=center|1979 |align=center|1982 |- |align=center|10 |Dhimitër Stamo |Ambassador |align=center|1983 |align=center|1986 |- |align=center|11 |Justin Papajorgji |Ambassador |align=center|1986 |align=center|1992 |- |align=center|12 |Tahir Elezi |Ambassador |align=center|1992 |align=center|1997 |- |align=center|13 |Hajdar Muneka |Ambassador |align=center|1997 |align=center|2000 |- |align=center|14 |Kujtim Xhani |Ambassador |align=center|2000 |align=center|2006 |- |align=center|15 |Maxhun Peka |Ambassador |align=center|2006 |align=center|2011 |- |align=center|16 |Kujtim Xhani |Ambassador |align=center|2011 |align=center|2016 |- |align=center|17 |Selim Belortaja |Ambassador |align=center|2017 |align=center|Present |- |} == References == Albania
